entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Implicit refs error when CPM is enabled #43604
  • Could not load file or assembly 'System.Windows.Forms, Version=9.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089' in .Net9-rc1 #43593
  • "csc.dll" exited with code 1 instead of compilation error details, under Linux only #43592
  • [NETSDKE2E][WIX]After configuring the policy key for .NET 9 and set it to nextSession then sign out of the machine and sign back, the net9RC1 Hosting Bundle cannot be removed. #43591
  • [NETSDKE2E][WIX]The installer UI could't pop out after double-clicking NET RC2 application in control panel if setting policy RemovePreviousVersion to a invalid value #43589

Closed

  • dotnet8 <AnalysisLevel> linux #43538
  • After installing .NET SDK 9.0 RC2, creating 6.0/8.0 Blazor WASM project requires September Servicing (we canceled the ship) feeds #43300

PullRequests

Created

  • insert 9.0.2xx into the codeflow #43608
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Change from "sln" to "solution" as primary, and add "sln" as alias #43607
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Publish prebuilt reports for each repo #43595
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'main' #43594
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Clean up some code #42775
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • License false positive exclusion for zlib cmake file #43603
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Unstable branding with rtm label and empty iteration #43483
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] make error for workload info clean Fixes #42581 #43587
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • .NET Source-Build 9.0.100-rc.1.24452.1 September 2024 Updates #43363
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2542909 #43514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #43552
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge the net10 dotnet/runtime and dotnet/aspnetcore codeflows #43070
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
